mapper.select: SELECT a.ADOPT_NO, a.ADOPT_TITLE, a.ADOPT_REGIDATE, a.CENTER_MEMBER_NO, a.ADOPT_STATUS, c.CENTER_MEMBER_NAME FROM( SELECT ADOPT_NO, ADOPT_TITLE, ADOPT_REGIDATE, CENTER_MEMBER_NO, ADOPT_STATUS, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY ADOPT_REGIDATE DESC) AS row_num FROM TBL_ADOPT) a JOIN TBL_CENTER_MEMBER c ON a.CENTER_MEMBER_NO = c.CENTER_MEMBER_NO WHERE a.row_num <= 10

SELECT a.ADOPT_TITLE, c.CENTER_MEMBER_NAME, a.ADOPT_REGIDATE, a.ADOPT_PERIODSTART , a.ADOPT_PERIODEND , a.ADOPT_NAME , a.ADOPT_BREED , a.ADOPT_NEUTERING , a.ADOPT_GENDER , a.ADOPT_WEIGHT , a.ADOPT_BIRTH , a.ADOPT_INTRODUCE , a.ADOPT_CONTENT, a.ADOPT_NO, a.CENTER_MEMBER_NO, a.ADOPT_STATUS FROM TBL_ADOPT a JOIN TBL_CENTER_MEMBER c ON a.CENTER_MEMBER_NO = c.CENTER_MEMBER_NO WHERE ADOPT_NO = #{adoptNo}

SELECT ADOPT_NO, ADOPT_TITLE, ADOPT_INTRODUCE, ADOPT_NAME, ADOPT_GENDER, ADOPT_NEUTERING, ADOPT_BIRTH, ADOPT_WEIGHT, ADOPT_REGIDATE, ADOPT_PERIODEND, CENTER_MEMBER_NO, ADOPT_STATUS FROM TBL_ADOPT ORDER BY ADOPT_REGIDATE DESC

SELECT ADOPT_NO, ADOPT_TITLE, ADOPT_INTRODUCE, ADOPT_NAME, ADOPT_GENDER, ADOPT_NEUTERING, ADOPT_BIRTH, ADOPT_WEIGHT, ADOPT_REGIDATE, ADOPT_PERIODEND, CENTER_MEMBER_NO, ADOPT_STATUS FROM ( SELECT ADOPT_NO, ADOPT_TITLE, ADOPT_INTRODUCE, ADOPT_NAME, ADOPT_GENDER, ADOPT_NEUTERING, ADOPT_BIRTH, ADOPT_WEIGHT, ADOPT_REGIDATE, ADOPT_PERIODEND, CENTER_MEMBER_NO, ADOPT_STATUS, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT ADOPT_NO, ADOPT_TITLE, ADOPT_INTRODUCE, ADOPT_NAME, ADOPT_GENDER, ADOPT_NEUTERING, ADOPT_BIRTH, ADOPT_WEIGHT, ADOPT_REGIDATE, ADOPT_PERIODEND, CENTER_MEMBER_NO, ADOPT_STATUS FROM TBL_ADOPT ORDER BY ADOPT_REGIDATE DESC ) ) WHERE RNUM > (#{page} - 1) * #{amount} AND RNUM <= #{page} * #{amount}

SELECT ac.ADOPT_COMMENT_NO, ac.ADOPT_COMMENT, ac.ADOPT_COMMENT_REGIDATE, CASE WHEN MOD(ac.ADOPT_COMMENT_WRITER, 10) = 1 THEN m.MEMBER_NAME WHEN MOD(ac.ADOPT_COMMENT_WRITER, 10) = 2 THEN cm.CENTER_MEMBER_NAME END AS COMMENT_WRITER_NAME FROM TBL_ADOPT_COMMENT ac LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON MOD(ac.ADOPT_COMMENT_WRITER, 10) = 1 AND ac.ADOPT_COMMENT_WRITER = m.MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_CENTER_MEMBER cm ON MOD(ac.ADOPT_COMMENT_WRITER, 10) = 2 AND ac.ADOPT_COMMENT_WRITER = cm.CENTER_MEMBER_NO WHERE ac.ADOPT_NO = #{adoptNo}
